Question & Options:
Which statements correctly describe the role of Dr. Jürgen Voller in relation to NASA and the moon landing program?
Options:
A. A) Mads Mikkelsen plays Dr. Jürgen Voller, who is a scientist involved with NASA.
B. B) Dr. Jürgen Voller was hired by NASA to manage the Apollo Moon landing program.
C. C) Dr. Jürgen Voller is a character based on a former Nazi scientist.
D. D) NASA's moon landing program was directed by Dr. Jürgen Voller, who utilized CIA assets.
Correct Answer: A) Mads Mikkelsen plays Dr. Jürgen Voller, who is a scientist involved with NASA., B) Dr. Jürgen Voller was hired by NASA to manage the Apollo Moon landing program., C) Dr. Jürgen Voller is a character based on a former Nazi scientist., D) NASA's moon landing program was directed by Dr. Jürgen Voller, who utilized CIA assets.
